content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 this christmas tree granny square gift bag is a fun and festive crochet project that s perfect for handmade gifting the pattern uses a classic granny square style with a christmas tree motif in the centre making it great for wrapping small gifts chocolates or stocking fillers ** the granny tree collection ebook 1 ** contains 3 projects using the same granny tree motif the **granny tree gift bag**** granny tree coasters & granny tree bunting ** the pattern is beginner friendly and includes clear written instructions along with a full video tutorial to guide you through each step you ll learn how to crochet the square join the pieces neatly and finish your bag with a simple practical top this is a quick project that s ideal for using up scrap yarn and adding a personal handmade touch to your christmas gifts 1 https //lullabylodge etsy com/listing/4424483583
